name: Para25
description:
This is a FZ GameJam 2021 game entry. It is a fully playable game but it only contains two levels at the moment.

I aim to continue working on the game until it has got all the features I didn't have time to implement. For instance more droids variations, droid hacking, droid library, more computer functionality, etc. In other words... all the good stuff that the original had + more. :)

You play the game with the cursor keys or wasd, CTRL to Fire and E to Interact.

Enjoy!

/Daniel aka O-san
